User.duplicates: That {{keys, field, list(type:disjunction)}} is already in use

mixed.oneOf: {{path, field}} must be one of the following values: {{values}}
mixed.notOneOf: {{path, field}} must not be one of the following values: {{values}}

string.min: {{path, field}} must be at least {{min}} characters
string.max: {{path, field}} must be at most {{max}} characters
string.email: {{path, field}} must be a valid email
string.url: {{path, field}} must be a valid URL
string.uuid: {{path, field}} must be a valid UUID
string.trim: {{path, field}} must be a trimmed string
string.lowercase: {{path, field}} must be a lowercase string
string.uppercase: {{path, field}} must be a upper case string

number.min: {{path, field}} must be greater than or equal to {{min}}
number.max: {{path, field}} must be less than or equal to {{max}}
number.positive: {{path, field}} must be a positive number
number.negative: {{path, field}} must be a negative number

date.min: {{path, field}} field must be later than {{min}}
date.max: {{path, field}} field must be at earlier than {{max}}

array.min: {{path, field}} field must have at least {{min}} items
array.max: {{path, field}} field must have less than or equal to {{max}} items
